reference: Paul is a proactive, decisive, consistent person with a very good attitude. That is why I consider him to be an optimal candidate for the Full Stack Position. If at the end of the collaboration we had a suitable position available, we would not have hesitated to hire him permanently. Sincerely,

I can whole heartedly recommend Paul as a perfect fit for any team. I am very conscious that a gain for any other team will undoubtedly be a loss for the Ballyliffin Hotel, however I am well aware that it would be both unfair and unreasonable to expect someone of Pauls character, ability and calibre to not want to push himself and challenge himself in a much wider world than our Donegal peninsula.
